paragraphs.body: This is the page where formal requests for moderator rights can be filed. Moderator rights enable normal users to remove and restore replies that are not their own on message walls and forum threads. It is particularly useful on Avatar Wiki when an admin is unavailable to take action against replies or threads that contravene the site's ${link_0}. The ability to close and highlight threads is also included. There is no maximum number of moderators, so if you believe you deserve moderator rights, please do not hesitate to make a request.
paragraphs.text: This is the page where formal requests for moderator rights can be filed. Moderator rights enable normal users to remove and restore replies that are not their own on message walls and forum threads. It is particularly useful on Avatar Wiki when an admin is unavailable to take action against replies or threads that contravene the site's discussion policy. The ability to close and highlight threads is also included. There is no maximum number of moderators, so if you believe you deserve moderator rights, please do not hesitate to make a request.

paragraphs.body: I, Tono555, would like to re-request moderator rights here in order to help moderate forums. I admit there have been times where I've reported comments that were possibly less serious and didn't need any action, but most of these occurred when I was a new user and didn't have much experience in this area. I don't usually go into forums asking people to get back on-topic or asking them to do something, as I don't feel I have any authority in the forums yet. However, I have, through my more than four years here given out warnings for comments, such as this one and this one, the latter dating back to 2014. I have reported a few instances on the admin noticeboard before, and I think I've shown responsibility as a user during my years of being a rollback user. Tono555  13:53, September 26, 2018 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I, HammerOfThor, am requesting moderator rights on Avatar Wiki. I believe I have shown good judgment in moderating the message walls, previously as a rollback and later as a moderator, and also more recently in reporting messages that contravene policies or informing users when they have done as such. I believe I have demonstrated an extensive knowledge of the site's policies and applied them in the manner expected, and will continue to do so should I gain these rights. HAMMEROFTHOR 18:36, November 8, 2018 (UTC)
